meanings.definition: A person who leads others in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent1: The misleaders in the story tricked the characters into going the opposite way.
meanings.sent2: The community was wary of the misleaders who tried to deceive them.
meanings.sent3: The misleaders thought they were clever, but their plans always backfired.
meanings.sent4: The misleaders were like wolves in sheep's clothing, hiding their true intentions.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the misleaders who pretend to be your friends but have ulterior motives.
